Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.25003126] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8 mg/L, MBC=32 mg/L);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=32 mg/L, MBC=32 mg/L);Fungi :Candida albicans(MIC=32 mg/L, MBC=32 mg/L)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.25003126] 100% hemolysis at 64 mg/L against horse red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans
